para.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:
"Determination of value" means a court order:
Determining the fair market value of real property pursuant to § 16-2934 or § 16-2938; or
Adopting the valuation of real property agreed to by all cotenants.
"Partition by sale" means a court-ordered sale of the entire real property, whether by auction, sealed bids, or open-market sale conducted pursuant to § 16-2938.
"Partition in kind" means the division of real property into physically distinct and separately titled parcels.
"Record" means information that is inscribed on a tangible medium or that is stored in an electronic or other medium and is retrievable in perceivable form.
